item.description:
LOCATION: Walk in, you will see stairs, turn to right, we are in corner.

COVER: Starts at 9pm and is $10. Please get there early or you'll be standing in line.

LINE: Harp has a huge line. Please do not text me to say that there is a line. You really should get there early and just chill with a drink because the lines can be quite cumbersome.

ENTERTAINMENT: The band starts at 10pm upstairs. The dancing starts at 9pm in the basement.

CHECK THIS SITE BEFORE YOU LEAVE YOUR HOUSE AS I MIGHT HAVE TO CHANGE VENUES!!!!

DATING: This is not a dating event - this is a social event centered around dancing and mingling.

FACEBOOK: Copy and paste this as an event on your FB and invite your buddies. The more the merrier.

DOUBLE BOOKING: Only RSVP to one site so I can have a correct head count (I'm posting this on Social Fun, Fun with Alcohol, and Boston Happy Hour)

SUGGESTIONS FOR NEXT TIME: Please send along your ideas about places!!!!

Â
item.how_to_find_us: At the bar - check back for more info
item.name: Saturday Night Social: The Harp
